channel.title: Kevin Sorenson
channel.description: Recent news about Kevin Sorenson, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Canada NewsWire (press release)
item.description:
Minister of State Sorenson Announces Funding to Strenghthen Arts, Culture and ...

item.title: Mentioned by Camrose Canadian
item.description:
MP celebrates one year of marketing freedom

item.title: Mentioned by Camrose Canadian
item.description:
Bittern Lake turns tap on new pump house
Crowfoot MP Kevin Sorenson was on hand for the announcement of the upgrades and said he is proud of the support the federal government gives to projects such as this one. “We are proud to invest in infrastructure projects just like this one. Not only in the ...

item.title: Mentioned by Camrose Canadian
item.description:
Sorenson appointed as Minister of State (Finance)
When Prime Minister Stephen Harper appointed his new cabinet July 15 a familiar Alberta face was on the list. Crowfoot MP Kevin Sorenson has been appointed as Minister of State (Finance) and said he is looking forward to the new challenge. “Obviously I'm ...

item.title: Mentioned by iPolitics.ca (subscription)
item.description:
Who is Kevin Sorenson?
The member of parliament for Crowfoot, Alta. has largely kept to himself since being elected for the first time in 2000 – Sorenson doesn't even have a Twitter account. While he's chaired a handful of committees, including a special committee on Canada's role in Afghanistan, ... “Congratulations to Kevin Sorenson, he will be a great voice for Rural Alberta as Minister of State Finance,” wrote fellow Alberta MP Blaine Calkins. This respect, is in part, because of the fact that he's been known to lend a helping hand. In 2002 ...

item.title: Mentioned by CJOB
item.description:
Mba MP's Bergen/Glover Named To Harper Cabinet
Among the other changes, Kellie Leitch takes on Labour, while Kerry-Lynne Findlay becomes minister of National Revenue. MP Kevin Sorenson becomes Minister of State for Finance. Greg Rickford is now the Minister of State for Science and Technology.
